prisonescape.game.io
Class DialogueUI

java.lang.Object
  com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      prisonescape.game.io.DialogueUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
public class DialogueUI
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter

DialogueUI creates the dialogue boxes used to display the text the Dialogue class provides.

Since:
0.1
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sean Corcoran, Sam Ward

showDialogue

public void showDialogue(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage s,
                         java.lang.String name)
Displays the dialogue box to show the interacted with entity's text

Parameters:
s - a Scene2D Stage used to add the dialogue box to
name - The String name of the interacted with entity used to title the dialogue box and get the dialogue

beenCalled

public boolean beenCalled()
Returns:
Whether a dialogue box has been called and is currently displayed

isVisible

public boolean isVisible()
Returns:
Whether a dialogue box is currently visible

hideAll

If a dialog box is present on screen, remove all dialog boxes from the stage

Parameters:
s - A Scene2D Stage
